templates.name: My code isn't working
templates.content: We are so sorry to hear this, we would recommend checking the terms and conditions for eligibility of the products and ensuring you are only using one code. If this continues to still not apply, please let us know which items you are trying to purchase alongside the code for us to assist further.

templates.name: Birthday rewards/loyalty
templates.content: I'm so sorry. The birthday gift was retired together with the loyalty program on 07/27/22, but we will provide other birthday treats to our loyal customers. Please make sure to check out our emails during your birthday month.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/elemis/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/elemis

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-855-235-3647 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Difference between the pro-collagen definition night cream and the oxygenating night cream
templates.content: They're both great choices, so you can't go wrong, but the key difference is that the pro-collagen visibly redefines, sculpts and smooths skin with its firming overnight moisturiser which reduces the appearance of sagging skin around the jowls, cheeks and chin, whereas the oxygenating night cream helps improve the appearance of skin suppleness, firmness, and elasticity which targets the signs of aging to reveal a radiant, firmer-looking complexion upon waking.

templates.content: We offer free ground shipping on all domestic orders.

templates.name: Customer support

templates.name: Do you have discounts?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't have any codes at the moment but feel free to check on our offers here: https://us.elemis.com/offers

templates.name: Can I request a sample?
templates.content: We don't give any samples at the moment, but I'd recommend visiting one of our stores or spas where they'll be happy to demonstrate our products and help you out with your decision. To find the nearest one near you, go here: https://elemis.attn.tv/sl/1V4aKHIc

templates.name: What is your approach to sustainability?
templates.content: Sustainability is the capacity to endure. In ecology, the word describes how biological systems remain diverse and productive over time. For humans, it's the potential for long-term maintenance of well-being, which in turn depends on the wellbeing of the natural world and the responsible use of natural resources. We actively seek out sustainable ingredients and always endeavours to support local growers and their communities.

templates.name: What is an active ingredient?
templates.content: An active ingredient is the most potent part of the plant extract. We take the first extraction, which can be hundreds of times more effective than the last extraction from the same extract. Similar to how a tea bag works - the first cup of tea it makes is strong and intense, the more its used in additional cups, the weaker and less effective it becomes.

templates.name: Do you use artificial fragrance?
templates.content: We only use natural, naturally derived and fine fragrances where possible.

templates.name: What are active natural bases and why do you use them?
templates.content: We develop products with active bases to ensure the whole product delivers serious results. This means that the base is not just an innate carrier for the key ingredients in the product but also contains the finest ingredients to deliver a positive action on the skin.

templates.name: Cancel/edit order
templates.content: I'm afraid once your order has been placed, we're unable to cancel or amend it. Apologies for the inconvenience! However please reach out to our Customer Care Team at customercare@elemis.com who will be able to assist you with a return.

templates.name: What can I do if a favorite product is discontinued?
templates.content: We're sorry to hear your favorite product has been discontinued! We do offer consultations via email or phone, to help you find an alternative product that will benefit your skin.

templates.name: Shipping Time
templates.content: We usually ship via USPS or FedEx and once shipped, it will take up to 12 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Do you offer gift wrapping?
templates.content: At the moment we do not provide gift wrapping, but you can include a gift message at checkout.

templates.name: Are all of your products pregnancy safe?
templates.content: All of our facial products are completely safe to use during pregnancy. There are some body products we would recommend avoiding, including the Cellutox body range. Please contact us at customercare@elemis.com for the full list of excluded body products.

templates.name: Do your products contain alcohol?
templates.content: Pease reach out to our customer care team at customercare@elemis.com who will be more than happy to assist you with this!

templates.name: Do your products contain preservatives?
templates.content: Pease reach out to our customer care team at customercare@elemis.com who will be more than happy to assist you with this!

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to check on this is to email our trade team directly at newbusiness@elemis.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Which Elemis products were offered on XXX cruise ship?
templates.content: Please reach out via email at postcruisecustomerservice@steinerlesuire.com. Rest assured you'll be in excellent hands!

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?
templates.content: All our items are made in England however, a few exceptions apply. Please refer to the product packaging for the correct statement of origin.

templates.name: Do you offer price adjustment?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we don't offer any price adjustments.

templates.name: Order status / Tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://us.elemis.com/order-status

templates.name: Manage Subscription
templates.content: I'm happy to help. You have complete control over your Subscription orders, and we will send you an email reminder 7 days before each order ships. You can update your details and change your delivery frequency, next order date, or quantity at any time by visiting "Subscriptions" located within your account. Changes to orders can be made up to 24 hours before the next scheduled shipment date. Please note that once your order is placed, we are unable to make any guaranteed amendments.

templates.name: How do I use the ELEMIS The Glow Edit?
templates.content: Use Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm as a daily cleanser. After cleansing, lightly massage Pro-Collagen Glow Boost Exfoliator into damp skin, then rinse of with warm water. Use Pro-Collagen Glow Boost Exfoliator 2-3 times a week after cleansing. Apply Superfood Glow Priming Moisturiser every morning after cleansing and for optimal results, use Superfood Midnight Facial every evening, or a minimum of twice weekly.

templates.name: How can I take your Virtual Skin Analysis?
templates.content: You can take our Virtual Skin Analysis here: https://elemis.attn.tv/aFEOVrNwz1zP . Answer three short questions to help us get a better understanding of your skin type and concerns!
